snippet: Federal officials on Thursday sent troops to Pernambuco State in northeast Brazil as reports of looting heightened fears that crime could surge during a strike by police officers.
abstract: Troops are deployed to Pernambuco State in northeast Brazil to restore calm after police strike sparks crime wave.
lead_paragraph: Federal officials on Thursday sent troops to Pernambuco State in northeast Brazil as reports of looting heightened fears that crime could surge during a strike by police officers.

headline.main: Brazil: Troops Deployed to Restore Calm
headline.print_headline: Brazil: Troops Deployed to Restore Calm
